title: Game Crashes
body:
Just joined a normal game and this https://gyazo.com/7e33b9ea792110adbdd5dec74d381826 is what happens. I literally cannot connect to the game.
Edit: Closing LoL Recorder fixed it instantly. Nice.

replies.body: Ya was about to tell you to exit Lolreplay/recorder. It's causing issues right now. I don't know when or if the developers will fix it. I suggest using [BaronReplays](https://ahri.tw/en/FAQ/).
